name: ClimeCheck
description: Climecheck ecosystem with a real-time Big Data Platform of climate monitoring devices around the world bringing live atmospheric ambient air quality data to everyone. All data is shared under a CC license where users, researchers, builders and enthusiasts can access this data as part of a networked community. Data on Climecheckâ€™s platform meets the FAIR guiding principles for scientific data management and stewardship, making the data Findability, Accessibility, Interoperability, and Reuseable.
